availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bourbon County, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Married to Rosannah Kenny. Father of Charles Kenny and Virginia Kenny. Married to Serena Kenny. Father of Blanche Kenny. Physician in Bourbon County, Kentucky in 1850. Physician in Bourbon County in 1860. Elected a delegate to the convention of the Union Democratic Party from Bourbon County on May 2, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky,Bourbon County, District 1, p. 290B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bourbon County, Eastern Division, p. 5.
Find A Grave, "Dr. William Kenney (1818-1904)," Memorial #160241640, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/160241640 (accessed May 3, 2020).
"Conservative Union Meeting in Bourbon,"The Courier-Journal(Louisville, Ky.), May 11, 1864, p. 1.
